Table of Contents

Namespace osu.Framework.Input.StateChanges

Classes

ButtonInput<TButton>

An abstract base class of an IInput which denotes a list of button state changes (pressed or released).

JoystickAxisInput
JoystickButtonInput
KeyboardKeyInput
MidiKeyInput

Represents an input from a MIDI device.

MouseButtonInput
MouseButtonInputFromTouch
MousePositionAbsoluteInput

Denotes an absolute change of mouse position. Pointing devices such as tablets provide absolute input.

MousePositionAbsoluteInputFromTouch
MousePositionRelativeInput

Denotes a relative change of mouse position. Pointing devices such as mice provide relative positional input.

MouseScrollRelativeInput

Denotes a relative change of mouse scroll. Pointing devices such as mice provide relative scroll input.

TabletAuxiliaryButtonInput
TabletPenButtonInput
TouchInput

Denotes a change of a touch input.

Structs

ButtonInputEntry<TButton>

Denotes a button state.

Interfaces

IInput

Denotes an input from an InputHandler.

IInputStateChangeHandler

An object which can handle InputState changes.

ISourcedFromTouch

Denotes an input which was sourced from a touch event. Generally used to mark when an alternate input was triggered from a touch source (ie. touch being emulated as a mouse).

Enums

ButtonStateChangeKind

Denotes a kind of change of a button state.
